name: LOVE
greetingText: Your presence in my life is the sweetest romance I could ever dream of
wishText: My cherished wife, on this Valentine's Day and every day, I am infinitely grateful for the love you bring into my life. You are my anchor in the storm, my guiding light in the darkness, and my constant source of joy. Here's to a lifetime of love and laughter together. Happy Valentine's Day, my love.
